remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象公开的功能集，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体支持。The object exposes the set of features that an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] font supports. 通过设置的属性在标记或代码中，你可以轻松地编写充分利用的文档[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]功能。By setting the properties of in markup or code, you can easily author documents that take advantage of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] features. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准大写字母，其后接样式为“SmallCaps”和“AllSmallCaps”的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 本例中，对所有三个单词均使用相同的字体大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本Text using OpenType capitals 下面的标记示例演示如何定义使用的属性的 Pescadero 字体大写字母对象。The following markup example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the object. 使用“SmallCaps”格式时会忽略任何前导大写字母。When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定备用批注格式的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the index of an alternate annotation form.
The index of the alternate annotation form.
The default value is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注形式包括标志符号放置在打开或实心圆、 正方形、 括号、 菱形或圆角的框。Annotation forms include glyphs placed in open or solid circles, squares, parentheses, diamonds or rounded boxes. 如果值大于零和所选字体不支持批注替代项，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is greater than zero and the selected font does not support annotation alternates, the default form of the letter is displayed. 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/>\<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 大写字母是一组以大写样式字形呈现文本的版式形式。Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs. 通常情况下，当以全大写呈现文本时，字母之间的间距可能看起来很小，字母的权重和比例看起来会很大。Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy. OpenType 大写字母，包括小型大写字母、 小号大写字母、 标题和大写字母间距支持大量的样式设置格式。OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing. 通过这些样式格式可控制大写字母的外观。These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准大写字母，其后接样式为“SmallCaps”和“AllSmallCaps”的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 本例中，对所有三个单词均使用相同的字体大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 大写字母的示例Example of capitals 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Pescadero 字体，大写字母使用属性。The following code example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using the property. 使用“SmallCaps”格式时会忽略任何前导大写字母。When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#9)] 以下代码示例完成与先前的标记事例相同的任务。The following code example accomplishes the same task as the previous markup example. [!code-csharp[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TypographyCodeSnippets/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#typographycodesnippet1)] [!code-vb[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TypographyCodeSnippets/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#typographycodesnippet1)] ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.Capitals**=""/ >\<*object* **Typography.Capitals**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 大写字母间距功能让你可以在使用全大写字母文本时提供更宽的间距。Capital spacing is a feature that allows you to provide more spacing when using all capitals in text. 大写字母通常设计为与小写字母混合使用。Capital letters are typically designed to blend with lowercase letters. 大写字母和小写字母之间看起来比较美观的间距在使用全大写字母时可能会显得过紧。Spacing that appears attractive between and a capital letter and a lowercase letter may look too tight when all capital letters are used. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的普通间距和大写字母间距。The following text displays normal and capital spacing for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本")![Text using OpenType capital spacing](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "Text using OpenType capital spacing") 普通字母和大写字母间距的示例Example of normal and capital spacing 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Pescadero 字体，大写字母间距使用属性。The following code example shows how to define capital spacing for the Pescadero font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#OpenTypeFontSnippet18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#opentypefontsnippet18)] ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.CapitalSpacing**="*bool*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.CapitalSpacing**="*bool*"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 随机备用连接形式为单个字符提供多种备用字形。Random contextual alternates provide multiple substitute glyphs for a single character. 实现脚本类型字体时，此功能可通过使用一组随机选择的外观稍有差异的字形来模拟手写内容。When implemented with script-type fonts, this feature can simulate handwriting by using of a set of randomly chosen glyphs with slight differences in appearance. 以下文本使用 Lindsey 字体的随机备用连接形式。The following text uses random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font. 请注意字母“a”外观稍有变化Notice that the letter "a" varies slightly in appearance ![使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本")![Text using OpenType random contextual alternates](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "Text using OpenType random contextual alternates") 随机上下文替代项的示例Example of random contextual alternates 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Lindsey 字体的随机上下文替代项使用属性。The following code example shows how to define random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 花体字形的某些组合可能导致文本外观欠佳，例如相邻字母的下行处出现重叠。Certain combinations of swash glyphs can cause an unattractive appearance, such as overlapping descenders on adjacent letters. 通过连接形式花体，可使用能生成更佳外观的替代花体字形。Using a contextual swash allows you to use a substitute swash glyph that produces a better appearance. 以下文本显示同一单词应用连接形式花体前后的外观。The following text shows the same word before and after a contextual swash is applied. ![使用 OpenType 上下文花体的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "使用 OpenType 上下文花体的文本")![Text using OpenType contextual swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "Text using OpenType contextual swashes") 上下文花体的示例Example of a contextual swash 下面的代码示例演示如何定义上下文花体 Pescadero 字体使用属性。The following code example shows how to define a contextual swash for the Pescadero font, using the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个 枚举值，该值指示使用数字时的宽度对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumerated value that indicates the alighnment of widths when using numerals.
A enumerated value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字体支持按比例和表格图功能，以使用数字时控制宽度的对齐方式。OpenType fonts support a proportional and tabular figure feature to control the alignment of widths when using numerals. 比例数字将每个数字视为具有不同的宽度—“1”窄于“5”。Proportional figures treat each numeral as having a different width—"1" is narrower than "5". 表格式数字被视为宽度相等的数字，因此它们可垂直对齐，从而增强财务类型信息的可读性。Tabular figures are treated as equal-width numerals so that they align vertically, which increases the readability of financial type information. 以下文本使用 Miramonte 字体显示第一列中的两个表格式数字。The following text displays two proportional figures in the first column using the Miramonte font. 请注意数字“5”和“1”之间的宽度差异。Note the difference in width between the numerals "5" and "1". 第二列显示相同的两个数值，并通过使用表格式数字功能调整其宽度。The second column shows the same two numeric values with the widths adjusted by using the tabular figure feature. ![使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本")![Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures") 比例和选项卡式数字示例Example of proportional and tabbed figures 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Miramonte 字体的比例和表格数字使用属性。The following code example shows how to define proportional and tabular figures for the Miramonte font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#OpenTypeFontSnippet19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/Window1.xaml#opentypefontsnippet19)] ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**=""/>\<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字体支持旧样式的数字格式。OpenType fonts support an old style numeral format. 此格式对于显示不再是标准样式的数字非常有用。This format is useful for displaying numerals in styles that are no longer standard. 以下文本以 Palatino Linotype 字体的标准和旧样式数字格式显示 18 世纪日期。The following text displays an 18th century date in standard and old style numeral formats for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字文本](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字的文本")![Text using OpenType old style numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "Text using OpenType old style numerals") 标准和旧样式数字的示例Example of standard and old style numerals 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的标准数字，后跟旧样式数字。The following text displays standard numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, followed by old style numerals. ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本")![Text using OpenType old style numeral sets](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "Text using OpenType old style numeral sets") 标准和旧样式数字集的示例Example of standard and old style numeral sets 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体的旧样式数字使用属性。The following code example shows how to define old style numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#11)] ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.NumeralStyle**=""/>\<*object* **Typography.NumeralStyle**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用斜杠零替换标称零字体格式。

value.span: 如果启用斜杠零格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if slashed zero forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字体支持前面带有斜线零数字格式以强调"O"的字母和数字"0"之间的差异。OpenType fonts support a slashed zero numeral format to emphasize the difference between the letter "O" and the numeral "0". 斜线零数字通常用于财务和商务信息中的标识符。The slashed zero numeral is often used for identifiers in financial and business information. 以下文本显示使用 Miramonte 字体的订单标识符。The following text displays a sample order identifier using the Miramonte font. 第一行使用标准数字。The first line uses standard numerals. 第二行使用斜线零数字，以便更易于与大写字母“O”进行区分。The second line used slashed zero numerals to provide better contrast with the uppercase "O" letter. ![文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字")![Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals") 斜线零数字的示例Example of slashed zero numerals 下面的代码示例演示如何定义斜线零数字 Miramonte 字体使用属性。The following code example shows how to define slashed zero numerals for the Miramonte font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#OpenTypeFontSnippet15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#opentypefontsnippet15)] 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持斜杠零格式，则显示的数字的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support slashed zero forms, the default form of the numeral is displayed. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

value.span: 如果启用了标准连字，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if standard ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的标准连字字形。The following text displays standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 连字的标准集示例Example of standard set of ligatures 下面的代码示例演示如何定义标准连字的 Pericles 字体的标志符号使用属性。The following code example shows how to define standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#4)] 默认情况下，OpenTypes 中存在多种字体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]启用标准连字。By default, OpenTypes fonts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enable standard ligatures. 例如，如果使用 Palatino Linotype 字体，则标准连字“fi”、“ff”和“fl”显示为组合字符字形。For example, if you use the Palatino Linotype font, the standard ligatures "fi", "ff", and "fl" appear as a combined character glyph. 请注意，每个标准连字的字符对之间彼此相连。Notice that the pair of characters for each standard ligature touch each other. ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 默认情况下启用的标准连字的示例Example of standard ligatures enabled by default 但是，可禁用标准连字功能，从而使“ff”等标准连字显示为两个单独的字形，而不显示为一个组合字符字形。However, you can disable standard ligature features so that a standard ligature such as "ff" displays as two separate glyphs, rather than as a combined character glyph. ![文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字")![Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures") 已禁用的标准连字的示例Example of disabled standard ligatures 下面的代码示例演示如何禁用使用字体的标准连字标志符号使用属性。The following code example shows how to disable standard ligature glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#6)] 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持标准连字，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support standard ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.StandardLigatures**="*bool*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.StandardLigatures**="*bool*"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 花体是使用精美修饰的装饰性字形，通常与书法相关。Swashes are decorative glyphs that use elaborate ornamentation often associated with calligraphy. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准和花体字形。The following text displays standard and swash glyphs for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 标准和花体标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "使用 OpenType 标准和花体标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs") 标准和花体字形的示例Example of standard and swash glyphs 花体通常用作事件公告等简短文章中的修饰元素。Swashes are often used as decorative elements in short phrases such as event announcements. 以下文本使用花体强调事件名称的大写字母。The following text uses swashes to emphasize the capital letters of the name of the event. ![使用 OpenType 花体的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "使用 OpenType 花体的文本")![Text using OpenType swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "Text using OpenType swashes") 用于大写字母形式花体的示例Example of swashes used for capital letters 下面的代码示例演示如何定义连接形式花体字体，使用属性。The following code example shows how to define swashes for a font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#7)] 如果值大于零和所选字体不支持在给定的索引值的标准连接形式花体窗体，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is greater than zero and the selected font does not support standard swashes forms at the given index value, the default form of the letter is displayed. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.StandardSwashes**="*int*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.StandardSwashes**="*int*"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

OpenType 字体，如以下示例中，使用的 Pericles 字体包含可用于创建不同的外观，文本的备用标志符号。OpenType fonts, such as the Pericles font used in the following examples, contain alternate glyphs that you can use to create different appearances for text. 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的标准字形。The following text displays standard glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 标准标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "使用 OpenType 标准标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType standard glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "Text using OpenType standard glyphs") 标志符号的标准集示例Example of standard set of glyphs Pericles OpenType 字体包含其他标志符号提供到一组标准的标志符号的样式替代项。The Pericles OpenType font contains additional glyphs that provide stylistic alternates to the standard set of glyphs. 以下文本显示样式备用字形。The following text displays stylistic alternate glyphs. ![使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 样式备用标志符号的示例Example of stylistic alternate glyphs 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Pericles 字体的样式备用标志符号使用属性。The following code example shows how to define stylistic alternate glyphs for the Pericles font, using the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个 枚举值，该值指示使用的标准版式格式的变体。

A enumerated value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问类实例。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 变体都类似于上标或下标字体窗体。Variants are similar to superscript or subscript font forms. 很可能包含不同的标志符号集之间上标和序号窗体中，下标和下级格式之间或字体窗体。It is possible for a font form to contain differing glyph sets between superscript and the ordinal form, or between subscript and inferior forms. 属性允许您为 OpenType 字体设置上标和下标的值。The property allows you to set superscript and subscript values for an OpenType font. 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的上标。The following text displays superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 上标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "使用 OpenType 上标的文本")![Text using OpenType superscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "Text using OpenType superscripts") 上标的示例Example of superscripts 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体上标使用属性。The following code example shows how to define superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#12)] 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的下标。The following text displays subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 下标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "使用 OpenType 下标的文本")![Text using OpenType subscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "Text using OpenType subscripts") 下标的示例Example of subscripts 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体的下标使用属性。The following code example shows how to define subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#13)] 不支持变体的字体可能具有字体窗体的算法近似值。Fonts that do not support variants may have an algorithmic approximation of the font form. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* **Typography.Variants**=""/ >\<*object* **Typography.Variants**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |
